mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId, s.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, b.title, b.content, ifnull(date_format(b.update_at, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-' ) AS updateAt, date_format(b.create_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s ON b.students_Id = s.students_id
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, update_at = now() WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
